Posts.Content: i have a tough question for you were you still trying to feed her when she was nauseated or is the nausea due to the disease process. How long after her chemo did this start happening? Our mom has this cancer and is having nausea  problems for the first time today thank you sorry for your loss
Posts.Title: Treatment for: carcinomatous meningitis

Posts.Content: My mom had breast cancer in 2000 an cancer free until 2005 in the first part of 2007 she was told she brain cancer an had six months to live and was fine until 2012 she pasted on Dec 15 2012 the last few months where the hardest but her mind was good till the last week or so. Everone is different that i can tell you and hard times are ahead for you but God, love and kindness will get you through and it will take every ounce or all you have doing the best you have god bless and your loved ones. Mom was 72 and did not do chemo or radiation and the breast cancer i hope this gives you something to go by oh you will see some changes.
